articles.content:
Piers Morgan has taken to Twitter following his friend Sharon Osbourne leaving her role on CBS' The Talk.
Former Good Morning Britain host Piers hit out on the micro-blogging site to back his pal af… [+5034 chars]
articles.description: Piers Morgan has thrown support behind his pal Sharon Osbourne after it was announced that she will no longer be starring on American panel show The Talk
articles.title: Piers Morgan defends Sharon Osbourne and claims she was 'bullied' off The Talk - Mirror Online

articles.description: BEIJING/OTTAWA (Reuters) -Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Saturday said China's sanctions against two American religious-rights officials and one Canadian lawmaker were unacceptable and vowed to continue to defend human rights.
articles.title: Canada's Trudeau calls Chinese sanctions over Xinjiang 'unacceptable' - The Star Online
